title: Graves is too oppressive. Its asinine that he even exists in the state he does.
body:
{{champion:104}}  with {{item:3812}} {{item:3046}} {{item:3026}} 

Wonderful. Super mobile, high RANGED damage, damage reduction plus a revive that gives him AD and armor on top of his True Grit.

Yeah, this isn't broken.

100% hands down the biggest joke in the game right now, is the fact that Riot lets exist.

If this doesn't make you question Riots judgement and process by which they do things, nothing will.
